item.title: IKS Health IPO share allotment today as GMP crosses ₹400: Steps to check status on NSE, BSE and Link Intime - CNBCTV18
item.description:
IKS Health IPO Share Allotment Today as GMP Surpasses ₹400

Publication Date: December 17, 2023 | Source: Various

The Jhunjhunwala family-backed Inventurus Knowledge Solutions Ltd. (IKS Health) is finalizing the share allotment status for its IPO today. The IPO, which raised ₹2,498 crores, saw a subscription rate of 52.68 times.

  • The IPO was open for subscription from December 12 to December 16.
  • Total applications received: 54.6 crore shares against 1.03 crore shares offered.
  • Non-Institutional Investors oversubscribed 23.25 times, retail investors 14.55 times, and institutional investors 80.64 times.
  • Share allotment status can be checked on BSE, NSE, and Link Intime websites.
  • Successful bidders will receive shares in their Demat accounts on December 18, with refunds processed on the same day.
  • Expected listing date on NSE and BSE is December 19.
  • The grey market premium (GMP) indicates a listing price potential of ₹1,704 per share, suggesting a gain of 30.47% over the IPO's upper price band.
"However, investors must note that GMP is speculative and may not be a true reflection of how the stock performs in reality."

In conclusion, the IKS Health IPO has generated significant investor interest, and those who applied can check their allotment status online.

item.title: Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Out: Know Latest GMP, How To Check Allotment Status Online - News18
item.description:
Vishal Mega Mart IPO Allotment Out: Latest GMP and How to Check Allotment Status

Last Updated: December 17, 2024, 06:56 IST

The Vishal Mega Mart IPO allotment has been finalized, with investors receiving bank debit messages. The latest GMP stands at 24.36%, indicating a decent listing gain for investors.

  • IPO opened for subscription from December 11 to December 13 and was subscribed 28.75 times.
  • Retail investors subscribed 2.43 times, NII 15.01 times, and QIB 85.11 times.
  • The IPO price band was set at Rs 74 to Rs 78 per share.
  • Vishal Mega Mart's unlisted shares are currently trading at Rs 98.5 in the grey market.
  • The listing is scheduled for December 18 on BSE and NSE.
“The Vishal Mega Mart IPO has generated significant buzz with its robust subscription numbers and decent GMP.”

Investors can check their allotment status on BSE and NSE websites or Kfin Technologies’ portal.

This IPO reflects strong investor interest and confidence in the retail market.

item.title: AI Picks THIS Brazilian Model As The Perfect Female Body: Do You Know AI’s Defination Of Perfection? - NewsX
item.description:
AI Names Brazilian Model Karol Rosalin as Ideal Female Body

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: NewsX

The AI has designated Brazilian fitness influencer Karol Rosalin as having the 'perfect female body,' lauding her symmetry and fitness achievements. Rosalin attributes her success to disciplined training and specific dietary choices.

  • Karol Rosalin is recognized for her symmetry, health, and fitness by AI systems from Playboy Australia.
  • Rosalin achieved a ‘perfect 10’ rating based on AI analysis of her physical attributes.
  • Her fitness journey began eight years ago, focusing on strength training five days a week and daily aerobic exercises.
  • She maintains a balanced diet featuring natural ingredients.
  • Expert opinions suggest genetics and lifestyle are crucial in determining body shape and perception of perfection.
“Already, seeing the results in the mirror is a victory. Being recognized as the ‘Perfect Fitness Woman’ is incredible!” - Karol Rosalin

This recognition underscores the subjective nature of beauty and fitness standards, which vary among individuals.

item.title: GST Council May Slash Tax On Online Food Delivery Charges To 5%: Report - News18
item.description:
GST Council May Slash Tax On Online Food Delivery Charges To 5%: Report

Last Updated: December 17, 2024, 05:17 IST

The GST Council is considering reducing the goods and services tax (GST) on food delivery charges by e-commerce operators from 18% to 5%, if approved by the Finance Minister-led council, the revised tax rate could come into effect starting January 1, 2022.

  • Current tax rate for online food delivery charges is 18%.
  • Proposed reduction could lower this to 5%.
  • Food delivery platforms like Zomato and Swiggy would not be eligible for input tax credits under the new proposal.
  • This proposal comes amid increased scrutiny from tax authorities.
“Recently, the tax department directed Zomato to pay Rs 803.4 crore in taxes and fines for non-payment of certain taxes during the period from 2019 to 2022.”

This potential change aims to alleviate the financial burden on consumers and is a response to heightened scrutiny on food delivery platforms.

item.title: India's solar energy agency changes bidding policy after Adani bribery allegations: Report - The Economic Times
item.description:
India's Solar Energy Agency Adjusts Bidding Policy Following Adani Bribery Claims

Publication Date: [Insert Publication Date]

Source: [Insert Source]

An Indian government agency responsible for promoting renewable energy has altered its bidding practices to mitigate corruption risks following U.S. bribery allegations against the Adani Group.

  • The Solar Energy Corporation of India (SECI) is changing how it issues power tenders.
  • The changes come after U.S. allegations of bribery involving Adani Group in tender processes.
  • SECI will base around 75% of its new bids on specific state demand, instead of primarily seeking suppliers first.
  • Previous bidding practices, accounting for about 90% of total bids, heightened corruption risks.
  • Despite the allegations against Adani, SECI has found no basis for investigations.
  • There are concerns these allegations could hinder foreign investments in India’s renewable sector.
  • SECI set a target to bid for 15 gigawatts (GW) of power this fiscal year, but achieved only 6-7 GW so far.
The allegations against the Adani Group could temporarily cut foreign investments in India's renewable sector.

In conclusion, SECI's adjustments to its bidding policy are a direct response to concerns over corruption amidst serious allegations, indicating a significant shift in how renewable energy projects may be approached in India.

item.title: Gold Rate Today In India: Check 22 Carat Price In Your City On December 16 - News18
item.description:
Gold Rate Today In India: Check 22 Carat Price In Your City On December 16

Last Updated: December 16, 2024, 19:14 IST

As of December 16, gold prices in India remained high. The cost of 24-carat gold was Rs 77,890 per 10 grams, while 22-carat gold was priced at Rs 71,400 per 10 grams.

Key Points:

  • 24-carat gold price: Rs 77,890 per 10 grams.
  • 22-carat gold price: Rs 71,400 per 10 grams.
  • Silver was trading at Rs 92,500 per kilogram.
  • Prices vary by city; for example, in Delhi, 22-carat gold is Rs 71,550.

Conclusion:

Gold maintains its significance as an investment and is especially important in cultural celebrations in India.

item.title: Reliance Capital Acquisition: How did Anil Ambani's company, once bigger than HDFC, become debt-ridden? Full timeline - ET Now
item.description:
Reliance Capital Acquisition: Hinduja Group's IndusInd International Holdings Ltd. (IIHL) plans to complete the takeover of debt-ridden Reliance Capital (RCAP).

Date: Updated Dec 16, 2024

Source: ET Now

The article discusses the decline of Reliance Capital, once a leading financial institution in India, and the impending acquisition by Hinduja Group's IIHL amidst its significant debt.

  • Hinduja Group's IIHL plans to takeover Reliance Capital.
  • Anil Ambani’s company had a market cap of over 70,000 crores.
  • The Reserve Bank of India intervened in November 2021, initiating insolvency.
“Reliance Capital had a debt of over 40,000 crores.”

This article illustrates the dramatic fall of Reliance Capital and highlights the changes that led to its current financial distress.

item.title: Raising the Standard for Stablecoins: Ripple USD Launches Globally with Unmatched Utility, Experience, and Compliance - Business Wire
item.description:
Raising the Standard for Stablecoins: Ripple USD Launches Globally with Unmatched Utility, Experience, and Compliance

Publication Date: December 17, 2024 Source: Business Wire

Ripple announces the global availability of Ripple USD (RLUSD), a USD-denominated stablecoin designed for trust and compliance, set to launch on major exchanges.

Key features of RLUSD include:

  • Available on major exchanges like Uphold and Bitso
  • Fully backed by U.S. dollar reserves and independent audits
  • Facilitates cross-border payments and integrates with DeFi protocols
“Stablecoins could become the backbone of private payments by offering a secure, scalable, and efficient alternative to traditional systems.” - Raghuram Rajan

Ripple's RLUSD combines innovation with regulatory credibility, aiming to shape the future of digital payments.

Market Trading Guide: Bharat Dynamics, Jupiter Wagons are among 4 stock recommendations for Tuesday

Date: Dec 16, 2024
Source: Economic Times

In light of the recent market conditions, analysts suggest the following stock recommendations for Tuesday:

  • Buy Avanti Feeds at Rs 664.3
    Target Price: Rs 700
    Stop Loss: Rs 640
  • Buy Bharat Dynamics above Rs 1,286.8
    Target Price: Rs 1,380
    Stop Loss: Rs 1,240
  • Buy Welspun Living at Rs 178.5
    Target Price: Rs 185/190
    Stop Loss: Rs 173
  • Buy Jupiter Wagons at Rs 560
    Target Price: Rs 600
    Stop Loss: Rs 538
“Nifty remained range-bound during the session, trading within the bands of 24,600 and 24,800... crucial support is placed at 24,500,” said Rupak De, Senior Technical Analyst at LKP Securities.

The outlook remains cautiously optimistic, with analysts highlighting the potential for upward momentum in selected stocks.

item.title: Why Enviro Infra Engineers Stock Price Is Surging? Shares Up By 15% In 2 Days - News18
item.description:
Why Enviro Infra Engineers Stock Price Is Surging? Shares Up By 15% In 2 Days

Date: December 16, 2024

Source: News18

Enviro Infra Engineers has experienced a significant surge in its stock price, climbing 15% in just two days, following a strong market debut that saw shares listed at a nearly 50% premium over their issue price.

  • Shares rose by 7% on December 16, reaching Rs 318.90.
  • The stock has doubled from its IPO price of Rs 148.
  • Investor confidence is driven by demand for sustainable water infrastructure solutions.
  • The IPO was oversubscribed 89.90 times, indicating strong market interest.
  • Prominent investors like Mukul Agarwal and Sunil Singhania back the company.
“The surge in Enviro Infra Engineers’ stock price can be attributed to growing demand for sustainable water infrastructure solutions,” analysts state.

This surge reflects not just a momentary spike but also a growing optimism about the company's long-term prospects in the sustainable infrastructure sector.

item.title: Vedanta, Mindspace REIT, Gravita India, HDFC Bank, Wipro, Religare and more: Top stocks to watch out for on De - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Top Stocks to Watch on December 17

Date: December 17, 2024 | Source: CNBC-TV18

Investors should pay attention to several key stocks today, including Vedanta, HDFC Bank, Wipro, and others, as they announce significant updates and developments.

  • Vedanta: Announced a ₹8.5 interim dividend per share.
  • Mindspace REIT: ADIA plans to divest a 9.2% stake through a block deal.
  • Gravita India: Launched a QIP to raise ₹750 crore, with the option to upsize.
  • HDFC Bank: Received a warning letter from SEBI over disclosure norms.
  • Wipro: Acquired Applied Value Technologies for up to $40 million.
  • Religare Enterprises: Received a show-cause notice from IRDAI.
  • HPCL: Approved a modernization project for its Mumbai refinery.
  • India Pesticides: Undergoing IT department searches; cooperating fully.
  • Nitco: Secured a ₹105.40 crore order from Prestige Estates Projects Ltd.
  • Godavari Biorefineries: Plans a ₹130 crore investment in a new ethanol distillery.
  • Mawana Sugars: Received notices regarding transactions linked to GST refunds.
  • Mankind Pharma: Launching a QIP to raise up to ₹3,000 crore for debt repayment.
  • GMR Airports: Reported record traffic with 11.2 million passengers in November 2024.
  • Indus Towers: Secured a tax ruling regarding depreciation claims worth ₹3,500 crore.
  • Texmaco Rail: Awarded a ₹187.41 crore order for transmission line construction.
  • HCC: Opening of a qualified institutional placement issue with a floor price of ₹45.27.
"The modernization project at HPCL aims to increase production capacity significantly."

Stay informed about these developments as they may influence market movements and investor sentiment.
